body:
Furry defenders are correct when they say that not all of them are pedophiles and/or sexual deviants, that's more like half of them.



The other half like to literally shit themselves, it's a thing.


Rainfurrest was a furry gathering from a few years ago, and they got kicked out of their hotel after leaving shit covered diapers all over the lobby, their rooms, and the parking lot.

body:
Yeah, I'm mostly joking around, but in all seriousness the sexual deviants and the scat fetishists share a bunch of overlap and make up a much larger portion of the community than average Redditors like to admit.


Agreed, a lot of pet/animal people who like to draw animals call themselves a furry, they should probably come up with another nickname or term to discern themselves from the freakshow.
body_html:
Yeah, I'm mostly joking around, but in all seriousness the sexual deviants and the scat fetishists share a bunch of overlap and make up a much larger portion of the community than average Redditors like to admit.

Agreed, a lot of pet/animal people who like to draw animals call themselves a furry, they should probably come up with another nickname or term to discern themselves from the freakshow.

body: I don't think there should be a nickname for them at all. First, what's the point? They were just fine before some creepy pedozoophile invited them to be a "furry". Second, having one would just immediately make it another furry haven.

body: I know a guy who stayed in the hotel that rainfurrest was held in. There was this one furry he remembers distinctly that never changed it's diaper during the entire time they stayed there. They were also sounding in the hallways, but we don't talk about that. Also open door orgies. And nitrous oxide. And a ton of other shit.
